function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evolution of measures for suppression may lead to decreased efficiency of containment","Impact":"Increase in transmission and potential epidemic rebound","Mitigation":"Continual assessment and adaptation of suppression measures to maintain effectiveness","Technologies":"Data-driven analysis and monitoring, predictive modeling, surveillance technology","People":"General population, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns regarding mobile phone tracking apps may hinder policy effectiveness","Impact":"Reduced scalability and effectiveness of suppression measures","Mitigation":"Addressing privacy concerns through transparent data usage policies, encryption, and user consent","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization, user privacy settings, consent management","People":"General population, technology developers, policymakers","Owner":"Technology companies, government, privacy advocates"},{"Description":"Inability to sustain intensive NPI packages for suppression may lead to rapid transmission rebound","Impact":"Potential epidemic comparable in scale to no interventions being adopted","Mitigation":"Continual enforcement of NPI measures, public health education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Communication technology, public health messaging platforms, data analytics for monitoring compliance","People":"General population, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations"}]}
